class error_code;
}}

{{tt|std::error_code}} represents a platform-dependent error code value. Each {{tt|std::error_code}} object holds an error code value originating from the operating system or some low-level interface and a pointer to an object of type {{lc|std::error_category}}, which corresponds to the said interface. The error code values are not required to be unique across different error categories.
